original: Theodore: ...Unfortunately,[p/] we lost him to illness very early in his life.
translation: Theodore: ……但很不幸的是，[p/]他很早就因病离开了我们。

original: Tyrion: It's a painting of a mage...[p/] But he doesn't quite look like a noble.
translation: Tyrion: 这是一幅关于法师的画像……[p/]但他看起来不太像一名贵族。

original: Theodore: Oh. That's Jason Steelwind.[p/] One of the chosen mages of the Scaled Lord.
translation: Theodore: 噢，那是杰森·斯蒂尔文德。[p/]是鳞甲领主选中的法师之一。

original: Celeste: Wait...[p/] "Steelwind"?[p/] As in-
translation: Celeste: 等下……[p/]“斯蒂尔文德”？[p/]那他就是——

original: Theodore: Yes.[p/] He's the earliest recorded ancestor of House Steelwind.
translation: Theodore: 没错。[p/]他是斯蒂尔文德一族最早被记载的先祖。

original: Theodore: Legends say that the Scaled Lord bestowed his power upon him and his allies to create the first mages.
translation: Theodore: 传说鳞甲领主把自身的力量赋予他和他的盟友们，并创造了第一批法师。

original: Celeste: Wow...[p/] It's hard to even tell that he and the prosecutor belong to the same bloodline.
translation: Celeste: 哇哦……[p/]甚至很难看出来他和检察官属于同一条血脉。

original: Theodore: As with all the noble houses,[p/] House Steelwind had quite humble beginnings.
translation: Theodore: 在所有贵族之中，[p/]斯蒂尔文德一家也算是出身平凡。

original: If only they'd remember where they came from...
translation: 要是他们还记得自己的出身就好了……

original: Tyrion: There's a fireplace with some burning wood.
translation: Tyrion: 这儿有个壁炉，里面有些柴火正在燃烧。

original: Tyrion: It looks pretty cozy.
translation: Tyrion: 看起来很舒适。

original: Tyrion: It's a fancy-looking chandelier.
translation: Tyrion: 看起来很花哨的吊灯。

original: Tyrion: There's a window with a view of a garden.
translation: Tyrion: 可以看到花园的窗户。

original: Tyrion: The headmaster has a nice view from up here.
translation: Tyrion: 校长可以通过这里欣赏优美的景色。

original: Tyrion: It's a small table for guests.
translation: Tyrion: 一个小巧的会客桌。

original: Tyrion: Is that...[p/] wine?
translation: Tyrion: 那是……[p/]葡萄酒吗？

original: Theodore: No, actually.[p/] It's just apple juice.
translation: Theodore: 不，并不是。[p/]那只是苹果汁。

original: Theodore: Most of my guests [i]are[/i] students after all.
translation: Theodore: 毕竟我的大多数来客<u>是</u>学生们。

original: THEODORE: This is terrible.
translation: THEODORE: 这太糟糕了。

original: THEODORE: To think that one of my prized students would be accused of murder.
translation: THEODORE: 我的爱徒之一竟会被指控为杀人犯。

original: TYRION: We heard your voice on the intercom when the lockdown happened.
translation: TYRION: 封锁发生的时候，我们从内部通讯系统听到了您的声音。

original: TYRION: Are you the one who triggered it?
translation: TYRION: 是您启动了封锁吗？

original: THEODORE: Y-[p/][s/]Yes.[p/] I activated it when I received a call from one of the staff.
translation: THEODORE: 是、[p/][s/]是我。[p/]我接到一位员工的传讯后，马上启动了封锁。

original: THEODORE: They reported that Professor Bellwether had been attacked.
translation: THEODORE: 她们报告贝尔维瑟教授被人袭击了。

original: TYRION: How does the lockdown system work?
translation: TYRION: 封锁系统是怎样运作的？

original: THEODORE: It’s an artificery network that covers the entire academy.
translation: THEODORE: 有一个奥术能源网络覆盖着整个学院。

original: THEODORE: In the event of an emergency,[p/] I can activate it using this stone.
translation: THEODORE: 当紧急情况发生时，[p/]我可以用这块符石启动它。

original: The headmaster pulls out a glowing stone from his desk.
translation: 校长从他的抽屉里取出一块发光的石头。

original: You can hear the hum of magical energy emanating from it.
translation: 你能听到它因充满魔法能量嗡嗡作响。

original: THEODORE: Once activated,[p/] the system creates magical barriers throughout the building.
translation: THEODORE: 一旦启动，[p/]这个系统会在整个建筑内创造魔法屏障。

original: THEODORE: It’s designed to contain and protect each room in the building.
translation: THEODORE: 它的设计可以包围并保护大楼内的每个房间。

original: TYRION: Could a powerful mage breach any of these barriers?
translation: TYRION: 强力的法师是否能突破这个屏障呢？

original: THEODORE: I doubt it.[p/] The barriers can withstand a great amount of force.
translation: THEODORE: 我认为不太可能。[p/]这些屏障可以承受很大的力量。

original: THEODORE: They even block mages from teleporting through them.
translation: THEODORE: 甚至能阻止法师用传送通过它们。

original: THEODORE: And once activated,[p/] even [i]I[/i] can’t turn it off for an hour.
translation: THEODORE: 而且一旦启动，[p/]即使是<u>我</u>也没办法在一小时之内关闭它。

original: TYRION: What can you tell me about Wallace?
translation: TYRION: 您能跟我说一说华莱士的事情吗？

original: TYRION: Earlier you said that he was “one of your prized students”.
translation: TYRION: 之前您说过他是您的“爱徒之一”。

original: THEODORE: …
translation: THEODORE: ……

original: TYRION: I just need to understand.
translation: TYRION: 我只是想弄清楚。

original: TYRION: Why did the prosecutor say that he was a necromancer?
translation: TYRION: 为什么检察官说他是一个死灵法师？

original: THEODORE: Because technically…[p/] he is one.
translation: THEODORE: 因为准确来说……[p/]他确实就是。

original: CELESTE: What?![p/][s/] But why would he study something like that?!
translation: CELESTE: 什么？！[p/][s/]他为什么要学习那种东西？！

original: THEODORE: [b]Necromancy[/b] is probably one of the most dangerous and most scrutinized schools of magic.
translation: THEODORE: [b]死灵术[/b]很可能是最危险，审查也最严格的奥术学派。

original: THEODORE: Its image has been long tainted by stories of dark wizards raising armies of the undead.
translation: THEODORE: 长期以来，阴暗的巫师唤起僵尸大军这类故事一直在抹黑它的形象。

original: THEODORE: However,[p/] it doesn’t just control the forces of death.[p/] It also controls the forces of life.
translation: THEODORE: 然而，[p/]它不仅仅操控死亡的力量。[p/]它也操控生命的力量。

original: TYRION: "Forces of life”?
translation: TYRION: “生命的力量”？

original: THEODORE: The truth is that healing magic is also classified as [b]necromancy[/b].
translation: THEODORE: 真相是，治愈魔法被归类为[b]死灵术[/b]的一种。

original: THEODORE: Most healers don’t care to admit it because of the stigma it has.
translation: THEODORE: 绝大多数治愈师因为它的污名而不敢承认这一点。

original: THEODORE: But that’s why Wallace is studying it.[p/] He wants to become a doctor.
translation: THEODORE: 但这正是华莱士研习它的原因。[p/]他想成为一名医生。

original: CELESTE: But there are plenty of mages who know healing magic.
translation: CELESTE: 但是很多法师都会使用治愈魔法。

original: CELESTE: Why is Wallace being singled out?
translation: CELESTE: 为什么只有华莱士被叫做死灵法师？

original: THEODORE: For years,[p/] he’s been studying [b]necromancy[/b] beyond basic healing magic.
translation: THEODORE: 这几年来，[p/]他一直在研究超出基础治愈魔法范围的[b]死灵术[/b]。

original: THEODORE: He believes that high-level [b]necromancy[/b] could revolutionize modern medicine.
translation: THEODORE: 他相信高阶[b]死灵术[/b]会革新现代医学。

original: THEODORE: …Unfortunately,[p/] many among the faculty don’t see it that way.
translation: THEODORE: ……不幸的是，[p/]许多教员并不这么认为。

original: THEODORE: Wallace doesn’t hail from a noble house.
translation: THEODORE: 华莱士并非贵族出身。

original: THEODORE: He’s a mage that was born among the commonfolk.
translation: THEODORE: 他是平民出身的法师。

original: CELESTE: He’s like me…
translation: CELESTE: 他就像我一样……

original: THEODORE: Many of the faculty fear that he’ll use his knowledge to raise armies of undead,[p/] just like the necromancers of old.
translation: THEODORE: 许多教员都害怕他会借此组建一支僵尸大军，[p/]就像从前的死灵法师们一样。

original: THEODORE: The Imperial Academy isn’t even [i]permitted[/i] to teach it to students beyond basic healing magic.
translation: THEODORE: 帝国学院甚至没有向学生教授基本治愈魔法的<u>许可</u>。

original: Tyrion: Then why did you allow him to study it?
translation: Tyrion: 那你又为什么允许他学习这些呢？

original: THEODORE: After everything that has happened to him,[p/] I made an exception.
translation: THEODORE: 看到他的所有经历后，[p/]我产生了一种期望。

original: TYRION: "Everything that has happened to him"?
translation: TYRION: “他的所有经历”？

original: THEODORE: …I’m not at liberty to say more.
translation: THEODORE: ……我无权透露详情。

original: THEODORE: You'll have to ask him if you wish to know more.
translation: THEODORE: 如果想知道更多，你们只能询问他本人。

original: ERIS: If you plan on defending Wallace,[p/] you’ll need his [b]Spell Compendium[/b].[p/] Am I correct?
translation: ERIS: 如果你准备为华莱士辩护，[p/]你会需要他的[b]法术汇编[/b]，[p/]我说得对吧？

original: TYRION: Yes.[p/] Having a client’s [b]Compendium[/b] is instrumental to acquitting them.
translation: TYRION: 是的。[p/]拿到[b]法术汇编[/b]对证明委托人的清白非常重要。

original: ERIS: You may find that a bit…[p/] difficult.
translation: ERIS: 但对你来说，这会……[p/]有点困难。

original: ERIS: You see.[p/] After a certain incident,[p/] he destroyed his [b]Compendium[/b].
translation: ERIS: 你看，[p/]在某件事发生后，[p/]他破坏了自己的[b]法术汇编[/b]。

original: TYRION: What?[p/] Why would he do that?
translation: TYRION: 什么？[p/]他为什么要这么做？

original: TYRION: Doesn’t he need that to use magic?
translation: TYRION: 他使用魔法不需要这个吗？

original: CELESTE: A [b]Spell Compendium[/b] is a device mages use to keep track of what spells they can cast.
translation: CELESTE: [b]法术汇编[/b]只是一个记录法师们可以使用什么魔法的装置。

original: CELESTE: It’s really convenient for remembering the formulas and incantations of your spells.
translation: CELESTE: 在回忆已知魔法的范式和咏唱内容这方面很便利。

original: CELESTE: But it’s not actually [i]required[/i] to use magic.
translation: CELESTE: 但在使用魔法时不是<u>必须</u>的。

original: CELESTE: …I thought of destroying mine a long time ago,[p/] but they’re really expensive.
translation: CELESTE: ……我很早之前想过破坏掉自己的汇编，[p/]但它还挺贵的。

original: Eris: Luckily,[p/] I have an unattuned [b]Spell Compendium[/b] right here.
translation: Eris: 很巧呀，[p/]我这里正好有一个还没绑定的[b]法术汇编[/b]。

original: Eris: I’d be more than happy to give it to you if it helps Wallace.
translation: Eris: 如果能帮上华莱士，我很乐意把它给你。

original: TYRION: O-[p/][s/]Oh…[p/][s/] Thanks!
translation: TYRION: 噢、[p/][s/]噢……[p/][s/]谢谢你！

original: ERIS: Wallace just needs to maintain physical contact with it for ten minutes.
translation: ERIS: 只需要让华莱士和它保持接触十分钟就行。

original: ERIS: After that,[p/] the [b]Compendium[/b] will attune to his magic.
translation: ERIS: 在那之后，[p/]这个[b]法术汇编[/b]就会与他的魔法绑定。

original: ERIS: Just make sure that you don’t let another mage like Celeste hold it.
translation: ERIS: 只是得保证在那之前你没有让另一个法师——比如塞莱斯特——拿着它。

original: ERIS: Once it attunes to a mage,[p/] no one else can use it.
translation: ERIS: 一旦它与某个法师绑定了，[p/]就没有其他人能再绑定它了。

original: THEODORE: …?[p/] Wait,[p/] but then how did
translation: THEODORE: ……？[p/]稍等，[p/]你又是怎么

original: THEODORE: Wonderful.[p/] I just hope you can persuade Wallace to attune to it.
translation: THEODORE: 太好了。[p/]我希望你能说服华莱士与它绑定。

original: TYRION: What can you tell me about Catherine Bellwether?
translation: TYRION: 您能跟我说说凯瑟琳·贝尔维瑟的事情吗？

original: THEODORE: …
translation: THEODORE: ……

original: Wow,[p/] that was a whole mess of emotions.
translation: 哇，[p/]这情绪可真是够复杂的。

original: THEODORE: She was rather...[p/] unpleasant to work with.
translation: THEODORE: 与她一起工作有点……[p/]让人不舒服。

original: TYRION: Can you think of any enemies she might have had?
translation: TYRION: 您能想起来可能与她有仇的人吗？

original: ERIS: You might as well list everyone who attended this school.
translation: ERIS: 那你可能要把学院里的每个人都列进来。

original: THEODORE: E-[p/]Eris...
translation: THEODORE: 厄、[p/]厄莉斯……

original: ERIS: It's best to be blunt with these sorts of things.
translation: ERIS: 对这类事情最好直言不讳呀。

original: ERIS: As you saw this morning,[p/] she had a pretty abrasive attitude toward the students.
translation: ERIS: 就像你今早上看到的，[p/]她对学生们的态度非常粗鲁。

original: ERIS: Many people in this school did [i]not[/i] care for her.
translation: ERIS: 学校里的许多人都<u>不</u>喜欢她。

original: TYRION: Maybe she wasn’t the nicest person…
translation: TYRION: 她可能确实算不上是很好的人……

original: TYRION: But would that really be enough to motivate someone to murder her?
translation: TYRION: 但真的会有人讨厌到要杀了她吗？

original: ERIS: She’d often target and harass students,[p/] especially those who were from the commonfolk.
translation: ERIS: 她经常针对骚扰某些学生，[p/]特别是那些出身于平民的。

original: ERIS: She even made a habit of expelling those students for minor infractions.
translation: ERIS: 她甚至经常因一些很轻微的过失就开除那些学生。

original: CELESTE: For commoners,[p/] magic can be our ticket out of poverty.
translation: CELESTE: 对平民来说，[p/]魔法可以是我们摆脱贫困的一张入场券。

original: CELESTE: I can’t imagine how it’d feel to have that opportunity unfairly taken from you.
translation: CELESTE: 我难以想象，被这样不公平地剥夺机会是怎样的感受。

original: ERIS: She put so much pressure on those students.
translation: ERIS: 她向那些学生施加了许多压力。

original: ERIS: Some of them even left the academy of their own volition.[p/] They couldn’t handle her constant verbal abuse.
translation: ERIS: 甚至有人因此自愿离开了学院。[p/]他们没办法承受她持续的辱骂对待。

original: Celeste: Even then...[p/] Would that really be enough motive to commit murder?
translation: Celeste: 就算是这样……[p/]这足够成为谋杀她的动机吗？

original: ERIS: The human psyche is a fragile thing.
translation: ERIS: 人类的心灵是很脆弱的。

original: ERIS: It’s astounding what someone might do when pushed far enough.
translation: ERIS: 人急烧香，狗急蓦墙嘛。

original: TYRION: What about her relationship with the faculty?
translation: TYRION: 那她与教职工们的关系如何？

original: THEODORE: In some cases,[p/] it was worse than it was with the students.
translation: THEODORE: 在某些情况下，[p/]比与学生的关系更糟糕。

original: THEODORE: She’d often treat the staff like her personal servants.
translation: THEODORE: 她经常把职工们当做自己的仆人使唤。

original: THEODORE: I’ve received many complaints from them about her behavior.
translation: THEODORE: 很多人都会对我投诉这些行径。

original: CELESTE: Sorry if this sounds rude, but…
translation: CELESTE: 这话说起来有点没礼貌，但是……

original: Celeste: Why didn’t you just fire her if she was such a big problem?
translation: Celeste: 如果她是这么个大麻烦，您为什么不干脆炒了她？

original: THEODORE: She’s used her position to curry favor with the noble houses over the years.
translation: THEODORE: 这么多年来，她一直利用自己的职位给贵族牟利。

original: THEODORE: As you can imagine,[p/] the academy’s board is controlled by the nobility.
translation: THEODORE: 正如你能想像的，[p/]学院的董事会受贵族控制。

original: THEODORE: If I ever tried to remove her,[p/] they would probably support her over me.
translation: THEODORE: 如果我尝试除掉她，[p/]那些人很可能会支持她而不是我。

original: Tyrion: I heard that you had a meeting scheduled with Professor Bellwether this morning.
translation: Tyrion: 我听说您约好今天上午与贝尔维瑟教授会面。

original: Tyrion: What time was this?[p/] And when did the meeting end?
translation: Tyrion: 具体是什么时候？[p/]这次会面什么时候结束的？

original: THEODORE: Our meeting was scheduled for noon.
translation: THEODORE: 我们约好正午见面。

original: THEODORE: She arrived on time,[p/] and our meeting lasted until 1:00 PM.
translation: THEODORE: 她准时到来，[p/]我们的谈话一直持续到下午 1:00。

original: TYRION: Did anything seem off about her to you?
translation: TYRION: 就您看来，她有什么不对劲的地方吗？

original: THEODORE: No.[p/] She seemed to be her usual self.
translation: THEODORE: 没有。[p/]她看起来和往常一样。

original: You detect a trace of fear…[p/] Or is it nervousness?
translation: 你感到他流露出一丝恐惧……[p/]或者是紧张？

original: TYRION: …If you don’t mind me asking,[p/] what was the purpose of your meeting?
translation: TYRION: 如果您不介意我这么问的话，[p/]这次会面的目的是什么？

original: THEODORE: We met to discuss routine administrative matters.
translation: THEODORE: 我们为了讨论常规行政事务进行会谈。

original: THEODORE: Despite our personal disagreements,[p/] we knew to stay civil when discussing professional affairs.
translation: THEODORE: 虽然个人意见有分歧，[p/]但我们讨论公务的时候还是会保持职业素养。

original: THEODORE: …But to be perfectly honest,[p/] it [i]did[/i] always feel like I was treading on eggshells when speaking with her.
translation: THEODORE: ……但是说实在话，[p/]与她交谈<u>确实</u>一直让我有如履薄冰之感。

original: Tyrion: But you were her superior,[p/] weren’t you?
translation: Tyrion: 但您才是她的上司，[p/]不对吗？

original: Tyrion: Didn’t she respect your authority?
translation: Tyrion: 她不尊重您的权威吗？

original: THEODORE: We had many arguments about how I was managing the academy.
translation: THEODORE: 就管理学院的方式，我们有过很多争论。

original: THEODORE: And she was very vocal about her distaste for the commonfolk students.
translation: THEODORE: 而她对反感平民法师这一点向来直言不讳。

original: THEODORE: She was…[p/] difficult,[p/] to say the least.
translation: THEODORE: 至少可以说……[p/]她这人……[p/]不好相处。

original: Theodore: I'm sorry that your first visit to the academy ended so tragically, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Theodore: 卡斯伯特先生，很遗憾你的首次来访会以这么悲惨的方式结束。

original: Tyrion: There's no need to apologize.[p/] No one could have guessed that today would turn out like this.
translation: Tyrion: 您不需要道歉。[p/]没有人能预料到今天会发生这种事情。

original: Theodore: Nevertheless,[p/] I hope you found our resources useful for your research.
translation: Theodore: 不管怎么说，[p/]希望我们的馆藏对你的研究有帮助。

original: ...Unfortunately,[p/] your research left with you even more questions about the Eye of Horus.
translation: ……不幸的是，[p/]你的研究只留下了更多关于荷鲁斯之眼的谜团。

original: Theodore: I'd [i]heard[/i] that Ms. Tymora had recently hired a mage.
translation: Theodore: 我有<u>听说</u>泰摩拉女士最近招募了一位法师。

original: Theodore: I hope that you found our resources useful for your studies.
translation: Theodore: 我希望我们的馆藏对你研习魔法有益处。

original: Celeste: Yeah, definitely.[p/] I was able to learn a lot of spells today.
translation: Celeste: 那肯定有帮助呀。[p/]我今天学会了好多魔法呢。

original: Theodore: "Spells"?
translation: Theodore: “好多魔法”？

original: Why does everyone react like that?[p/] Is learning multiple spells [i]not[/i] normal?
translation: 为什么每个人都是这种反应？[p/]难道一下子学会好几条法术<u>不正常</u>吗？

original: Theodore: Anyways,[p/] I'm glad you enjoyed using our Library.
translation: Theodore: 总之，[p/]我很高兴你们享受使用学院的图书馆。

original: Theodore: Our academy [i]does[/i] offer admission to mages from the commonfolk.
translation: Theodore: 我们学院<u>也</u>向平民出身的法师发放录取通知书。

original: Theodore: Would you be interested in enrolling here?
translation: Theodore: 你有兴趣在这里就读吗？

original: Celeste: No offense,[p/] but I just [i]can't[/i] stand the idea of being cooped up in a school like this.
translation: Celeste: 无意冒犯，[p/]但我仅仅想一想被关在这样的学校里都<u>没法</u>忍受。

original: Celeste: I like learning about magic in the field.
translation: Celeste: 我喜欢靠实践学习魔法。

original: Theodore: Ah...[p/] That's unfortunate...
translation: Theodore: 啊……[p/]那太可惜了……

original: Tyrion: Have you met the prosecutor, Mr. Redmond?
translation: Tyrion: 您有见到检察官吗，雷德蒙先生？

original: Theodore: Ah.[p/] I am already well acquainted with her.
translation: Theodore: 啊。[p/]我和她本来就很熟悉。

original: Theodore: She was once a student here.
translation: Theodore: 她曾经是这里的学生。

original: Celeste: Oh, right.[p/] She [i]is[/i] a noble.
translation: Celeste: 哦，对哦。[p/]她<u>是</u>个贵族嘛。

original: Celeste: It makes sense that she'd go to school here.
translation: Celeste: 她在这里上学还蛮合理的。

original: Theodore: Did you know?[p/] Eris is one of our top students in the study of [i]illusion[/i] magic.
translation: Theodore: 你们知道吗？[p/]厄莉斯是我们这里<u>幻象术</u>方面最顶尖的学生之一。

original: Eris: Thank you, headmaster.[p/] I appreciate your praise.
translation: Eris: 谢谢您，校长。[p/]感谢您的夸赞。

original: Tyrion: Why [i]do[/i] you study illusion magic, Eris?
translation: Tyrion: 厄莉斯，你<u>为什么</u>学习幻象术？

original: Eris: Oh,[p/] no particular reason.
translation: Eris: 噢，[p/]没什么特别的原因。

original: Eris: I just happened to have an affinity for it.
translation: Eris: 我只是凑巧喜欢它。

original: Eris: It's also quite enjoyable to use my magic to deceive people.
translation: Eris: 用我的魔法欺骗别人也挺好玩的。

original: Tyrion: Ms. Tymora mentioned that you gave us permission to use the Library.
translation: Tyrion: 泰摩拉女士说过，是您给予我们使用图书馆的许可。

original: Tyrion: I can't thank you enough for that.[p/] We learned a lot.
translation: Tyrion: 真的感激不尽。[p/]我们学到了很多东西。

original: Theodore: Of course.[p/] I'm always willing to aid the younger generation in the pursuit of knowledge.
translation: Theodore: 应该的。[p/]我一向愿意帮助你们年轻一代追求知识。

original: Tyrion: How [i]do[/i] you know Ms. Tymora, anyways?
translation: Tyrion:  话说回来，您是<u>怎么</u>认识泰摩拉女士的？

original: Theodore: Ah...[p/] That's...
translation: Theodore: 啊……[p/]那是因为……

original: Oh...[p/] Did she defend him in a court case?
translation: 噢……[p/]她曾在法庭上为他辩护过吗？

original: From his reaction,[p/] it must have been a hard time in his life.
translation: 从他的反应来看，[p/]那一定是一段困难的经历。

original: It'd be best not to pry further.
translation: 最好不要再深究了。

original: TYRION: What can you tell me about Wallace?
translation: TYRION: 您能跟我说一说华莱士的事情吗？

original: TYRION: Earlier you said that he was “one of your prized students”.
translation: TYRION: 之前您说过他是您的“爱徒之一”。

original: THEODORE: …
translation: THEODORE: ……

original: TYRION: I just need to understand.
translation: TYRION: 我只是想弄清楚。

original: TYRION: Why did the prosecutor say that he was a necromancer?
translation: TYRION: 为什么检察官说他是一个死灵法师？

original: THEODORE: Because technically…[p/] he is one.
translation: THEODORE: 因为准确来说……[p/]他确实就是。

original: CELESTE: What?![p/][s/] Why would he study something like that?!
translation: CELESTE: 什么？！[p/][s/]他为什么要学习那种东西？！

original: THEODORE: [b]Necromancy[/b] is probably one of the most dangerous and most scrutinized schools of magic.
translation: THEODORE: [b]死灵术[/b]很可能是最危险，审查也最严格的奥术学派。

original: THEODORE: Its image has been long tainted by stories of dark wizards raising armies of the undead.
translation: THEODORE: 长期以来，阴暗的巫师唤起僵尸大军这类故事一直在抹黑它的形象。

original: THEODORE: However,[p/] it doesn’t just control the forces of death.[p/] It also controls the forces of life.
translation: THEODORE: 然而，[p/]它不仅操控死亡的力量。[p/]它也操控生命的力量。

original: TYRION: "Forces of life”?
translation: TYRION: “生命的力量”？

original: THEODORE: The truth is that healing magic is also classified as [b]necromancy[/b].
translation: THEODORE: 真相是，治愈魔法被归类为[b]死灵术[/b]的一种。

original: THEODORE: Most healers don’t care to admit it because of the stigma it has.
translation: THEODORE: 绝大多数治愈师因为它的污名而不敢承认这一点。

original: THEODORE: But that’s why Wallace is studying it.[p/] He wants to become a doctor.
translation: THEODORE: 但这正是华莱士研习它的原因。[p/]他想成为一名医生。

original: CELESTE: But plenty of the mages here know healing magic.
translation: CELESTE: 但是很多法师都会使用治愈魔法。

original: CELESTE: Why is Wallace being singled out?
translation: CELESTE: 为什么只有华莱士被叫做死灵法师？

original: THEODORE: For years,[p/] he’s been studying [b]necromancy[/b] beyond basic healing magic.
translation: THEODORE: 这几年来，[p/]他一直在研究超出基础治愈魔法范围的[b]死灵术[/b]。

original: THEODORE: He believes that high-level [b]necromancy[/b] could revolutionize modern medicine.
translation: THEODORE: 他相信高阶[b]死灵术[/b]会革新现代医学。

original: THEODORE: …Unfortunately,[p/] many among the faculty don’t see it that way.
translation: THEODORE: ……不幸的是，[p/]许多教员并不这么认为。

original: THEODORE: Wallace doesn’t hail from a noble house.
translation: THEODORE: 华莱士并非贵族出身。

original: THEODORE: He’s a mage that was born among the commonfolk.
translation: THEODORE: 他是平民出身的法师。

original: CELESTE: He’s like me…
translation: CELESTE: 他就像我一样……

original: THEODORE: Many fear that he’ll use his knowledge to raise armies of undead just like the necromancers of old.
translation: THEODORE: 许多人都恐惧于他会用自己的知识组建一支僵尸大军，[p/]就像从前的死灵法师们一样。

original: THEODORE: The Imperial Academy isn’t permitted to teach it to students beyond basic healing magic.
translation: THEODORE: 帝国学院甚至不被允许向学生教授基本的治愈魔法。

original: THEODORE: He is the only student at our academy who is even permitted to study it.
translation: THEODORE: 他甚至是我们学院中唯一被允许学习它的人。

original: Tyrion: Why is Wallace the only person exempt from these rules?
translation: Tyrion: 为什么华莱士是唯一不受这条规则约束的人？

original: THEODORE: After everything that has happened to him,[p/] I made an exception.
translation: THEODORE: 看到他的所有经历后，[p/]我产生了一种期望。

original: TYRION: "Everything that has happened"?
translation: TYRION: “他的所有经历”？

original: THEODORE: …I’m not at liberty to say more.
translation: THEODORE: ……我无权透露详情。

original: THEODORE: You'll have to ask him if you wish to know more.
translation: THEODORE: 如果想知道更多，你们只能询问他本人。

original: TYRION: What can you tell me about Catherine Bellwether?
translation: TYRION: 您能跟我谈一谈凯瑟琳·贝尔维瑟的事情吗？

original: THEODORE: …
translation: THEODORE: ……

original: Wow,[p/] that was a whole mess of emotions.
translation: 哇，[p/]这情绪可真是够复杂的。

original: THEODORE: She was rather...[p/] unpleasant to work with.
translation: THEODORE: 与她一起工作有点……[p/]让人不舒服。

original: TYRION: Can you think of any enemies she might have had?
translation: TYRION: 你能想起来可能与她有仇的人吗？

original: ERIS: That would be a long list of people.
translation: ERIS: 那个名单可是会很长喔。

original: THEODORE: E-[p/][s/]Eris...
translation: THEODORE: 厄、[p/][s/]厄莉斯……

original: ERIS: It's best to be blunt with these sorts of things.
translation: ERIS: 对这类事情最好直言不讳呀。

original: ERIS: As you saw this morning,[p/] she has a pretty abrasive attitude towards the students.
translation: ERIS: 就像你今早上看到的，[p/]她对学生们的态度非常粗鲁。

original: ERIS: Many people in this school didn’t care for her.
translation: ERIS: 学校里的许多人都不喜欢她。

original: TYRION: Maybe she wasn’t the nicest person…
translation: TYRION: 她可能确实算不上是很好的人……

original: TYRION: But would that really be enough motivation for someone to murder her?
translation: TYRION: 但真的会有人讨厌到要杀了她吗？

original: ERIS: She’d often target and harass students.[p/] Especially those who were from the commonfolk.
translation: ERIS: 她经常针对骚扰某些学生，[p/]特别是那些出身于平民的。

original: ERIS: She even made a habit of expelling those students for minor infractions.
translation: ERIS: 她甚至经常因一些很轻微的过失就开除那些学生。

original: CELESTE: For commoners,[p/] magic can be our ticket out of poverty.
translation: CELESTE: 对平民来说，[p/]魔法可以是我们摆脱贫困的一张入场券。

original: CELESTE: I can’t imagine how it’d feel to have that opportunity unfairly taken from you.
translation: CELESTE: 我难以想象，被这样不公平地剥夺机会是怎样的感受。

original: ERIS: She put so much pressure on those students.
translation: ERIS: 她向那些学生施加了许多压力。

original: ERIS: Some of them even left the academy of their own volition.[p/] They couldn’t handle her constant abuse.
translation: ERIS: 那些学生里有些人甚至自愿离开了学院。[p/]他们没办法承受她持续的辱骂对待。

original: Celeste: Even then...[p/] Would that really be enough motive to commit murder?
translation: Celeste: 就算是这样……[p/]这足够成为谋杀她的动机吗？

original: ERIS: The human psyche is a fragile thing.
translation: ERIS: 人类的心灵是很脆弱的。

original: ERIS: It’s astounding what someone can do when pushed to their breaking point.
translation: ERIS: 人急烧香，狗急蓦墙嘛。

original: TYRION: What about her relationship with the faculty?
translation: TYRION: 那她与教职工们的关系如何？

original: THEODORE: In some cases,[p/] it was worse than it was with the students.
translation: THEODORE: 在某些情况下，[p/]比与学生的关系更糟糕。

original: THEODORE: She’d often treat the staff like her personal servants.
translation: THEODORE: 她经常把职工们当做自己的仆人使唤。

original: THEODORE: I’ve received many complaints from them about her behavior.
translation: THEODORE: 很多人都会对我投诉这些行径。

original: CELESTE: Sorry if this sounds rude, but…[p/] Why didn’t you just fire her if she was such a big problem?
translation: CELESTE: 这话说起来有点没礼貌，但是……[p/]如果她是这么个大麻烦，您为什么不干脆炒了她？

original: THEODORE: She’s used her position to curry favor with the noble houses over the years.
translation: THEODORE: 这么多年来，她一直利用自己的职位给贵族牟利。

original: THEODORE: As you can imagine,[p/] the academy’s board is mainly composed of nobility.
translation: THEODORE: 正如你能想像的，[p/]学院的董事会受贵族控制。

original: THEODORE: If I ever tried to remove her,[p/] they would probably support her over me.
translation: THEODORE: 如果我尝试除掉她，[p/]那些人很可能会支持她而不是我。

original: Tyrion: Mr. Hughes doesn't seem like the most...[p/] reliable employee.
translation: Tyrion: 休斯先生看起来好像不是个很……[p/]可靠的雇员。

original: Theodore: Ah,[p/] it may appear as that.
translation: Theodore: 啊，[p/]看起来可能是那样。

original: Theodore: But he is actually quite reliable when a job needs to be completed.
translation: Theodore: 但有工作需要完成的时候他其实挺靠谱的。

original: Tyrion: ...Really?
translation: Tyrion: ……真的？

original: Theodore: When one wants to avoid work,[p/] they learn to perform as efficiently as possible.
translation: Theodore: 如果一个人想逃避工作，[p/]他们就会尽可能提高效率。

original: Theodore: I suppose laziness can be a virtue in that regard.
translation: Theodore: 这么看来懒惰也会变成一种美德。

original: Tyrion: How long have you been headmaster of the Imperial Academy, Mr. Redmond?
translation: Tyrion: 雷德蒙先生，您担任帝国学院的校长有多久了？

original: Theodore: For as long as I can remember.
translation: Theodore: 从我还能记得的时候就已经是了。

original: Theodore: I have dedicated my life to nurturing the knowledge and growth of young mages.
translation: Theodore: 我将自己的一生都献给了充实知识与培养年轻法师的事业。

original: Theodore: And I hope to do so for many more years.
translation: Theodore: 我也希望还能这样干很多年。

original: ...His emotions don't match with what he's saying.
translation: ……他的情感和他刚说的不一致。

original: Tyrion: The Imperial Academy is actually quite big when I look at it.
translation: Tyrion: 我看到帝国学院其实还挺大的。

original: Theodore: Well, of course.[p/] We [i]are[/i] the primary source of magical education for mages throughout the kingdom.
translation: Theodore: 那肯定是的。[p/]我们<u>是</u>为王国的法师们教育魔法的主要力量。

original: Theodore: As you may well know,[p/] most of the mages enrolled here are of the nobility.
translation: Theodore: 你可能也知道，[p/]大多数在这里就读的法师是贵族。

original: Theodore: Their families have invested a lot into our facilities.
translation: Theodore: 我们的大部分设施都是由这些家族投资。

original: Tyrion: Steelwind told us that you had a bit of a mishap in Lecture Hall 2-B.
translation: Tyrion: 斯蒂尔文德告诉我们，您曾在 2-B 讲堂出了一个小事故。

original: Theodore: A-[p/]Ah,[p/] yes...
translation: Theodore: 呃、[p/]啊，[p/]是这样……

original: Theodore: I was filling in for the alchemy instructor when I accidentally misread the instructions she left.
translation: Theodore: 我当时正在代替炼金术讲师授课，但不小心读错了她留的说明。

original: Theodore: I'm quite embarrassed to admit that my old age is catching up with me.
translation: Theodore: 承认我年事已高确实有些尴尬。

original: Theodore: It's a terrible thing that happened.
translation: Theodore: 发生那样的事情确实很糟糕。

original: Theodore: To think that someone would commit [i]murder[/i] within the academy.
translation: Theodore: 没想到有人竟然在这所学院里实施<u>谋杀</u>。

original: Tyrion: Using [b]necromancy[/b] no less...
translation: Tyrion: 而且居然还使用了[b]死灵术[/b]……

original: Theodore: …Yes.[p/] It's all a lot to take in...
translation: Theodore: ……是啊。[p/]看起来还有很多事情需要调查……

original: Tyrion: What can you tell me about this, Mr. Redmond?
translation: Tyrion: 关于这个您有什么想法吗，雷德蒙先生？

original: Theodore: Ah...[p/] My apologies.
translation: Theodore: 啊……[p/]很抱歉。

original: Theodore: I've learned a lot in my years,[p/] but I can't say much about that.
translation: Theodore: 我曾经研究过很多东西，[p/]但关于这个我没什么好说的。

original: You follow the map that Steelwind gave you.
translation: 你按照斯蒂尔文德给的那张地图走。

original: And you arrive at the Headmaster’s Office.
translation: 然后你到达了校长室。

original: Theodore: Oh?[p/] Hello, there.
translation: Theodore: 噢？[p/]你好，请进来吧。

original: Theodore: I wasn’t expecting guests today.
translation: Theodore: 我没想到今天会有客人。

original: TYRION: Sorry for coming unannounced.
translation: TYRION: 抱歉没提前告诉您就来了。

original: TYRION: You must be…
translation: TYRION: 您一定是……

original: THEODORE: My name is Theodore Redmond.[p/] I'm the headmaster of the Wyverngarde Imperial Academy.
translation: THEODORE: 我是西奥多·雷德蒙。[p/]是维文加德帝国学院的校长。

original: THEODORE: And judging from [i]your[/i] appearance…[p/] You must be the protégé of Ruby Tymora.
translation: THEODORE: 从<u>你的</u>外观来看……[p/]你一定是鲁比·泰摩拉的那位徒弟。

original: THEODORE: To what do I owe the pleasure?
translation: THEODORE: 有何贵干呢？

original: ERIS: They must be here to investigate the murder.
translation: ERIS: 他们一定是来这里调查谋杀案的。

original: TYRION: Wait…[p/] Eris?
translation: TYRION: 等等……[p/]厄莉斯？

original: Tyrion: I thought you went to see Wallace.
translation: Tyrion: 我以为你去探视华莱士了。

original: ERIS: Unfortunately,[p/] the Inquisition is questioning him right now.
translation: ERIS: 很不巧，[p/]裁判所的人正好在问他话。

original: ERIS: They aren't allowing visitors.
translation: ERIS: 他们不允许探视。

original: CELESTE: He must be so scared right now…
translation: CELESTE: 他现在一定很害怕……

original: CELESTE: I hope he’s okay.
translation: CELESTE: 希望他还好。

original: Right…[p/] She had the same experience not too long ago.
translation: 对了……[p/]她在不久之前也有类似的经历。

original: THEODORE: If there’s anything I can do to help,[p/] please let me know.
translation: THEODORE: 如果我能帮上什么忙，[p/]请告诉我。

original: Wallace: Let…[p/][s/] Let me go!
translation: Wallace: 放……[p/][s/]放开我！

original: Wallace: I’m not going [i]anywhere[/i] until I see her!
translation: Wallace: 见不到她，<u>休想</u>让我走！

original: Theodore: I-[p/]I’m sorry, Wallace…[p/] But she’s already passed…
translation: Theodore: 节、[p/]节哀顺变吧，华莱士……[p/]她已经不在人世了……

original: Theodore: There was nothing more they could have done…
translation: Theodore: 大家有心无力……

original: Wallace: How?![p/][s/] This academy teaches the best mages in the kingdom!
translation: Wallace: 怎么可能？！[p/][s/]这所学院是王国顶级法师的摇篮啊！

original: Wallace: Are you telling me that they couldn’t do [i]anything[/i]?!
translation: Wallace: 你竟然说他们<u>有心无力</u>？！

original: Theodore: Her condition was much worse than we thought…
translation: Theodore: 她的病情比我们预期中更加危重……

original: Theodore: The kingdom's magic isn’t advanced enough to treat something like this…
translation: Theodore: 王国的魔法仍有不足，治不了这样的病……

original: Wallace: Lucio Steelwind can rain meteors from the sky!
translation: Wallace: 卢西奥·斯蒂尔文德能从天空召唤出流星雨来！

original: Wallace: William Frega can teleport entire [i]caravans[/i] across the continent!
translation: Wallace: 威廉·弗雷加能将整个商队<u>连人带车</u>传送到大陆的另一头！

original: Wallace: Are you telling me that your mages couldn’t cure [i]one[/i] disease?!
translation: Wallace: 你却说你们学园的法师连<u>一种病</u>都治不好？！

original: Theodore: I’m…[p/] sorry.[p/] I truly am.
translation: Theodore: 我……[p/]很抱歉。[p/]真的很抱歉。

original: Wallace: …
translation: Wallace: ……

original: Wallace: Emily…
translation: Wallace: 艾梅莉……

original: Tyrion: I’m sorry, Celeste…[p/] But there’s no way out of this…
translation: Tyrion: 不好意思啊，塞莱斯特……[p/]这盘棋已经被你下死了……

original: Celeste: …
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste's attention is sharply focused on the chessboard between you two.
translation: 塞莱斯特全神贯注，紧盯着摆在两人之间的棋盘。

original: You can see her eyes quickly dart from piece to piece.
translation: 你能看到她的目光飞快地在棋子间移动。

original: Celeste: J-[p/][s/]Just give me a second![p/][s/] I can still win this!
translation: Celeste: 再、[p/][s/]再给我一秒钟！[p/][s/]我还有胜算！

original: Tyrion: Celeste,[p/] there’s no way for you to avoid checkmate next turn.
translation: Tyrion: 塞莱斯特，[p/]无论你怎么下，也逃不开下一回合被将死的命运。

original: Tyrion: Just surrender…
translation: Tyrion: 别垂死挣扎了……

original: She ignores you and continues staring at the pieces.
translation: 她没搭理你，继续盯着棋子。

original: Celeste: …
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: There![p/][s/] What about that?!
translation: Celeste: 看招！[p/][s/]知道厉害了吧？！

original: Tyrion: …Checkmate.
translation: Tyrion: ……将军。

original: Celeste: Damn it!
translation: Celeste: 可恶啊！

original: Ruby: Would you two keep it down?
translation: Ruby: 你们俩不能小声点吗？

original: Ruby: We [i]are[/i] in a library.
translation: Ruby: 我们在<u>图书馆</u>呢。

original: Ms. Tymora glances at the chessboard.
translation: 泰摩拉女士扫了眼棋盘。

original: Ruby: …I hope you didn’t spend the [i]entire[/i] morning playing around.
translation: Ruby: ……你们两个不会下棋下了<u>一整个</u>上午吧。

original: Celeste: I-[p/]I’ve been working hard, Ruby!
translation: Celeste: 我、[p/]我可用功了，鲁比！

original: Celeste: I’ve already learned two new spell formulas since we got here!
translation: Celeste: 我们到图书馆这么一会儿，我都学会两个法术啦！

original: Ruby: Hm…[p/] Well at least there's that.
translation: Ruby: 嗯……[p/]也算没白来。

original: Ruby: What about you, Cuthbert?
translation: Ruby: 你呢，卡斯伯特？

original: Tyrion: U-[p/]Um…[p/] Well-
translation: Tyrion: 呃、[p/]嗯……[p/]怎么说呢——

original: Your flustered stammering tells her exactly how much progress [i]you’ve[/i] made.
translation: 只看你这言辞闪烁、做贼心虚的样子，她就知道<u>你</u>有多勤奋了。

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I couldn't find any books about the…[p/] subject we’ve been looking into.
translation: Tyrion: 我、[p/][s/]我找了半天，没找到我们要找的……[p/]那个话题的书。

original: You’ve spent the entire day combing through the kingdom’s imperial library,[p/] researching the Eye of Horus.
translation: 你整整一天都泡在帝国图书馆里，掘地三尺，[p/]想找出与荷鲁斯之眼相关的文献。

original: During Celeste’s trial,[p/] you awakened to a new ability that you never used before.
translation: 塞莱斯特的庭审中，[p/]你觉醒了以前没用过的新能力。

original: Up until then,[p/] you thought that the Eye could only see surface-level thoughts.
translation: 在此之前，[p/]你一直以为荷鲁斯之眼只能看到表面的想法。

original: But during that moment with Garrick Pierce,[p/] the Eye of Horus was empowered.[p/] And you could see far more than usual.
translation: 但面对加里克·皮尔斯时，[p/]荷鲁斯之眼增强了。[p/]你能看到的东西远超以往。

original: You told Ms. Tymora about what happened.[p/] And it made you both wonder what other hidden abilities the Eye might have.
translation: 你跟泰摩拉女士说了事情经过。[p/]你们两个都很好奇，荷鲁斯之眼会不会还有其他待挖掘的能力。

original: You both decided it’s time to find out more about the Eye and its origins.
translation: 你们决定好好查一查这荷鲁斯之眼是什么，有什么来头。

original: This library supposedly held the kingdom’s entire knowledge of magic and the Arcane Arts.
translation: 按理说，帝国图书馆藏书丰富，囊括了全王国的魔法与奥术知识。

original: …But you couldn't find a single mention of any ability like the Eye.
translation: ……可你连一句跟荷鲁斯之眼沾边的描述都找不出来。

original: Ruby: Does the kingdom seriously lack knowledge about it?
translation: Ruby: 王国真的对此毫无了解吗？

original: Ruby: …Or do we need to look somewhere else?
translation: Ruby: ……我们是不是需要换个地方看看？

original: Celeste: Are you sure you can’t tell me what you’re researching?
translation: Celeste: 你要查的内容真不能透露给我吗？

original: Celeste: I’ve traveled around the world.[p/] I might have seen something like it.
translation: Celeste: 我去过世界各地，[p/]说不准见过你要找的东西呢。

original: You entertain the thought for a moment...[p/] But you haven't known her for very long.
translation: 你考虑了一下……[p/]但你跟她认识的时间不长。

original: The Eye of Horus is a supernatural ability that can't be detected by a [b]Spell Compendium[/b].
translation: 荷鲁斯之眼是超自然的能力，[b]法术汇编[/b]检测不出来。

original: You've always been wary about what the kingdom might do to you if they ever found out about it.
translation: 你一直提心吊胆，生怕王国发现荷鲁斯之眼。要是被他们注意到，也不知是何下场。

original: Tyrion: S-[p/]Sorry,[p/] it’s not something I can really talk about…
translation: Tyrion: 对、[p/]对不起，[p/]我不方便谈这个……

original: Celeste: ...Fine.
translation: Celeste: ……那好吧。

original: Eris: If I had to guess,[p/] I would say that they are looking into supernatural phenomena.
translation: Eris: 我猜，[p/]他们要查的是特异现象。

original: Celeste: Ah…?!
translation: Celeste: 啊……？！

original: You and Celeste nearly jump out of your chairs.
translation: 你和塞莱斯特吓得差点从椅子上蹦起来。

original: You look over to where the voice came from.[p/] She appears to be a student at the academy.
translation: 你看向声音的源头。[p/]她似乎是学院的学生。

original: How long was she there?[p/] You didn't notice her presence at all.
translation: 她在那儿站了多久了？[p/]你完全没注意到什么时候多了个人。

original: You also feel like she looks oddly familiar.
translation: 你莫名地感觉她有点眼熟。

original: Eris: I’m terribly sorry if I startled you.[p/] But I couldn’t help but overhear your conversation.
translation: Eris: 要是吓到你们，真不好意思。[p/]我实在忍不住偷听你们说话。

original: As the girl approaches your table,[p/] you see another student frantically running after her.
translation: 她走近你的桌子。[p/]这时，一名学生着急忙慌地追了过来。

original: Wallace: E-[p/][s/]Eris![p/][s/] You can’t just-
translation: Wallace: 厄、[p/][s/]厄莉斯！[p/][s/]你怎么能——

original: Wallace: I-[p/][s/]I’m so sorry!
translation: Wallace: 非、[p/][s/]非常抱歉！

original: Eris: Oh, it’s fine, Wallace.
translation: Eris: 噢，没事的，华莱士。

original: Ruby: I’m sorry, but…[p/] who [i]are[/i] you two?
translation: Ruby: 不好意思请问一下……[p/]你们二位是<u>什么人</u>？

original: Eris: Sorry, that was incredibly rude of me.
translation: Eris: 抱歉，是我太失礼了。

original: Eris: My name is Eris Illmater.
translation: Eris: 我叫做厄莉斯·伊尔马特。

original: Eris: And this is Wallace Nightgrave.
translation: Eris: 他叫华莱士·奈特格雷夫。

original: Eris: We’re both students here.
translation: Eris: 我们都是这个学院的学生。

original: Wallace: H-[p/]Hi…
translation: Wallace: 你、[p/]你们好……

original: Ruby: Not to be rude…[p/] but that was a private conversation.
translation: Ruby: 我不想扫二位的兴……[p/]但这是私密对话。

original: Ruby: Just how much did you hear?
translation: Ruby: 你们偷听了多少？

original: Eris: Hm…[p/] I wonder…
translation: Eris: 嗯……[p/]我在想……

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Eris: Reading about the supernatural is actually a hobby of mine.
translation: Eris: 其实我有个爱好，喜欢读关于超自然现象的书。

original: Eris: I might be able to help you with your research, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Eris: 说不准我能帮你们查到什么资料呢，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Ruby: And what makes you so sure that [i]is[/i] what we were researching…
translation: Ruby: 你为什么这么笃定，我们要找的<u>一定是</u>超自然现象……

original: Eris: Mr. Cuthbert has a bad habit of muttering to himself when he thinks.
translation: Eris: 卡斯伯特先生有个坏习惯，思考时会自言自语。

original: Eris: I assumed that his research had [i]something[/i] to do with the supernatural.
translation: Eris: 我想他的研究和超自然力量<u>有点关系</u>吧。

original: You feel a piercing side glance from Ms. Tymora.
translation: 泰摩拉女士狠狠地盯了你一眼。

original: You avoid eye contact with her.
translation: 你避开了她的视线。

original: Tyrion: B-[p/]But anyways,[p/] do you mind if I ask you a few questions?
translation: Tyrion: 总、[p/]总之，[p/]我能问你点事情吗？

original: Eris: Of course.[p/] I’d be happy to help.
translation: Eris: 当然可以~[p/]很高兴能帮忙。

original: Ruby: Wait[p/]
translation: Ruby: 等等[p/]

original: Ruby: Fine...[p/] I suppose it wouldn't hurt.
translation: Ruby: 好吧……[p/]应该没什么大不了的。

original: Ruby: Just…[p/] remember to show some discretion, Tyrion.
translation: Ruby: 只是……[p/]切记要慎重，提利昂。

original: Tyrion: Right...
translation: Tyrion: 当然……

original: The library is full of books for educational purposes.
translation: 图书馆里大多都是教科书。

original: You've been combing through these books all morning.
translation: 你已经花了一上午在这些书里翻翻找找了。

original: It's a holy text of some sort.
translation: 这是某种圣典。

original: It must be related to the Church of Bahamut.
translation: 一定与巴哈姆特教会有关。

original: It's a table for students to sit at.
translation: 一副供学生们使用的桌椅。

original: You've been sitting here with Celeste all morning.
translation: 你已经在这里和塞莱斯特坐了一上午了。

original: Tyrion: It's a globe of the world.
translation: Tyrion: 是个地球仪。

original: Tyrion: It's amazing how many other nations there are aside from Wyverngarde.
translation: Tyrion: 没想到除了维文加德以外还有如此多的国家。

original: Celeste: I've been to most of these places.
translation: Celeste: 这上面的好多地方我都去过。

original: Celeste: You should come with me next time, Tyrion.
translation: Celeste: 提利昂，有机会你应该和我一起去看看。

original: That's a nice thought.
translation: 好主意。

original: Maybe you can travel with her when you're less busy.
translation: 或许你在未来不那么忙的时候，可以和她一起周游世界。

original: There's some sort of notice taped to one of the shelves.
translation: 其中一个书架上贴着某种告示。

original: "Due to constant misuse of the Arcane Constructs' voice systems,[p/] voice lines can now only be set by Headmaster Redmond.".
translation: “鉴于奥术构造体声音控制系统的滥用情况，[p/]目前仅校长雷德蒙可更改构造体的相关语音设定。”

original: You wonder what it's referring to.
translation: 你很好奇这是在指什么事。

original: TYRION: So, you two are students at the Imperial Academy.
translation: TYRION: 所以说，你们两个都是帝国学院的在读生。

original: ERIS: Yes.[p/] I’m currently studying [b]illusion[/b] magic.
translation: ERIS: 对的。[p/]我目前正在学习[b]幻象术[/b]。

original: CELESTE: Illusions…[p/] That’s the kind of magic that lets you turn invisible, right?
translation: CELESTE: 幻象术……[p/]是那种能把你变成隐形人的魔法对吗？

original: ERIS: Technically,[p/] yes.[p/] But few mages ever reach a level high enough for that.
translation: ERIS: 从魔法的可行性上来讲，确实可以，[p/]但很少有法师能达到那种水平。

original: ERIS: I’m a bit embarrassed to admit that I'm not able to cast [b]Invisibility[/b].
translation: ERIS: 虽然有点不好意思……但我目前确实用不了[b]隐形术[/b]。

original: CELESTE: That’s still pretty cool![p/] What about you, Wallace?
translation: CELESTE: 光是学习这门魔法就已经很酷了！[p/]你呢，华莱士？

original: WALLACE: I-[p/]I…[p/] U-[p/]Um…
translation: WALLACE: 啊、[p/]我……[p/]呃、[p/]唔……

original: ERIS: Wallace has his own…[p/] [i]unique[/i] field of study.
translation: ERIS: 华莱士有他自己……[p/]<u>独到的</u>研究分野。

original: WALLACE: …
translation: WALLACE: ……

original: It’s probably not your place to pry…
translation: 这或许不是你该打探的事情……

original: ERIS ILLMATER: Everyone is talking about you two.
translation: ERIS ILLMATER: 大家都在谈论你们俩呢。

original: TYRION CUTHBERT: R-[p/]Really?
translation: TYRION CUTHBERT: 是、[p/]是这样吗？

original: ERIS ILLMATER: It’s rare for the school to let any outsiders in.
translation: ERIS ILLMATER: 学院允许外人进来还挺罕见的。

original: That makes sense.[p/] This library isn’t exactly open to the public.
translation: 有道理。[p/]这座图书馆其实并不向公众开放。

original: You were only able to get access to it because of Ms. Tymora’s connections.
translation: 你们只是因为泰摩拉女士的关系才能进来。

original: ERIS ILLMATER: We only ever get occasional visits from the noble houses.
translation: ERIS ILLMATER: 我们只知道偶尔有贵族会来访。

original: ERIS ILLMATER: So, I was curious as to who was able to break this dull monotony.
translation: ERIS ILLMATER: 所以我也很好奇谁能够打破贵族对探访权的垄断。

original: CELESTE MCCOY: Well…[p/] I’m a mercenary.[p/] But now I work as Tyrion’s bodyguard.
translation: CELESTE MCCOY: 这个……[p/]我是个雇佣兵，[p/]不过现在担任提利昂的护卫。

original: WALLACE CHILLGRAVE: M-[p/][s/]Mercenary?!
translation: WALLACE CHILLGRAVE: 雇、[p/][s/]雇佣兵？！

original: After her trial,[p/] it turned out that Celeste was more than capable of affording your services.
translation: 在她的庭审过后，[p/]你发现塞莱斯特富得很，支付你的报酬也绰绰有余。

original: However,[p/] Ms. Tymora still proposed a different arrangement.
translation: 然而，[p/]泰摩拉女士仍然提出了一个不同的安排。

original: After indicting Garrick Pierce,[p/] you painted a large target on your back.
translation: 告发加里克·皮尔斯后，[p/]你变成了一个很显眼的目标。

original: With Celeste being a mercenary,[p/] Ms. Tymora decided to hire her as your bodyguard.
translation: 正好塞莱斯特一直从事佣兵工作，[p/]泰摩拉女士决定雇佣她担任你的贴身护卫。

original: She figured you would feel more comfortable around someone you were already friends with.
translation: 她指出让你的朋友担任护卫也会让你更自在。

original: TYRION CUTHBERT: Anyways,[p/] I’m a defense attorney.
translation: TYRION CUTHBERT: 总之，[p/]我是一名辩护律师。

original: ERIS ILLMATER: A…[p/] defense attorney?
translation: ERIS ILLMATER: 一名……[p/]辩护律师？

original: ERIS ILLMATER: Hm…
translation: ERIS ILLMATER: 嗯……

original: TYRION CUTHBERT: …?
translation: TYRION CUTHBERT: ……？

original: ERIS: My apologies.[p/] It’s just…[p/] not what I was expecting.
translation: ERIS: 不好意思哦。[p/]只是……[p/]和我预想的不一样。

original: What’s [i]that[/i] supposed to mean…?
translation: 她<u>这话</u>是什么意思？

original: ERIS ILLMATER: “Supernatural phenomena”…
translation: ERIS ILLMATER: “超自然现象”……

original: ERIS ILLMATER: I wonder why you would be researching such a thing?
translation: ERIS ILLMATER: 我很好奇你们为什么要研究这类东西？

original: CELESTE MCCOY: Yeah![p/][s/] I want to know too!
translation: CELESTE MCCOY: 是啊！[p/][s/]我也想知道！

original: RUBY TYMORA: …
translation: RUBY TYMORA: ……

original: TYRION CUTHBERT: I-[p/][s/]I’m sorry.[p/] But I can’t really say…
translation: TYRION CUTHBERT: 抱、[p/][s/]抱歉，[p/]但我真的不能说……

original: ERIS ILLMATER: Regardless,[p/] there are many spells in this world.
translation: ERIS ILLMATER: 毕竟，[p/]世界上有很多种魔法嘛。

original: ERIS ILLMATER: So,[p/] why are you so convinced that this phenomenon [i]wasn't[/i] produced by a spell?
translation: ERIS ILLMATER: 所以说，[p/]你为什么这么确信这种现象<u>不是</u>奥术魔法的效果呢？

original: TYRION CUTHBERT: What we’re looking into doesn’t seem to follow the classic rules of magic.
translation: TYRION CUTHBERT: 我们调查的对象看起来不遵循奥术魔法的基本规则。

original: ERIS ILLMATER: Oh?[p/] How so?
translation: ERIS ILLMATER: 哦？[p/]怎么说？

original: ERIS ILLMATER: Please tell me.
translation: ERIS ILLMATER: 拜托告诉我啦。

original: TYRION CUTHBERT: It…[p/] was created by someone who's not a mage.
translation: TYRION CUTHBERT: 它……[p/]不是被一位法师创造出来的。

original: ERIS ILLMATER: Oh really?
translation: ERIS ILLMATER: 真的吗？

original: Eris: So, you’re saying that this was something created by a person?
translation: Eris: 所以，你意思是这个东西是被一位普通人创造的？

original: RUBY TYMORA: …
translation: RUBY TYMORA: ……

original: The words came out of your mouth before you realized it.
translation: 在你意识到之前话语就已经从你的口中说了出来。

original: You send a small apologetic look to Ms. Tymora.
translation: 你向泰摩拉女士递过去一个抱歉的眼神。

original: ERIS ILLMATER: Hm…[p/] That [i]does[/i] remind me of a story.
translation: ERIS ILLMATER: 嗯……[p/]这倒<u>确实</u>让我想起一个故事来了。

original: TYRION CUTHBERT: A…[p/] story?
translation: TYRION CUTHBERT: 一个……[p/]故事？

original: ERIS ILLMATER: Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] Do you know the legend about how the Kingdom of Wyverngade was created?
translation: ERIS ILLMATER: 卡斯伯特先生。[p/]你知道维文加德王国的建国传说吗？

original: TYRION CUTHBERT: You mean the story about the ancient dragons?
translation: TYRION CUTHBERT: 你是说那些古龙的传说吗？

original: CELESTE MCCOY: The ancient what?!
translation: CELESTE MCCOY: 古什么？

original: Celeste: Does Wyverngarde have a story about ancient dragons?
translation: Celeste: 维文加德有关于古龙的故事吗？

original: Tyrion: It’s only about [i]one[/i] ancient dragon.[p/] The Church of Bahamut refers to him as the "Scaled Lord".
translation: Tyrion: 那不只是一条<u>古龙</u>。[p/]巴哈姆特教会尊称他为“鳞甲领主”。

original: Tyrion: I'm sure you've even heard people mention him before.
translation: Tyrion: 我很确定你应该听到过别人提到他。

original: Tyrion: Legends say that the first mages were created centuries ago by him.
translation: Tyrion: 传说他在几百年前创造了第一批法师。

original: Tyrion: At that time,[p/] our kingdom was caught in the middle of a brutal war.
translation: Tyrion: 当时，[p/]我们的王国深陷一场残酷的战争之中。

original: Tyrion: With no way to defend themselves,[p/] the kingdom was on the brink of destruction.
translation: Tyrion: 他们没有能力抵御外敌，[p/]王国濒临毁灭。

original: Tyrion: Our people prayed to Bahamut:[p/] the God of Dragons,[p/] for salvation.
translation: Tyrion: 我们的国民只能向巴哈姆特，[p/]也就是巨龙之神祈祷，[p/]祈望他带来救赎。

original: Tyrion: And almost as if to answer their prayers,[p/] Rathallion:[p/] the last scaled lord,[p/] appeared before them.
translation: Tyrion: 然后就像是回应了他们的祈祷，[p/]拉萨利昂，[p/]末代鳞甲领主，[p/]真的现身在他们面前。

original: Tyrion: The Scaled Lord bestowed the gift of magic on a band of heroes who were fighting on the front lines.
translation: Tyrion: 鳞甲领主将魔法赠礼给前线奋勇作战的一队英雄们。

original: Tyrion: With their magic,[p/] these heroes utterly overtook the kingdom's enemies and singlehandedly won the war.
translation: Tyrion: 在魔法的帮助之下，[p/]英雄们彻底战胜了敌人，靠他们的力量赢得了战争。

original: Tyrion: It’s said that these heroes went on to form the noble houses of today.
translation: Tyrion: 据说这些英雄的后代发展形成了今日的贵族家族。

original: Ruby: Hmph…[p/] What a load of nonsense…
translation: Ruby: 哼……[p/]一大堆胡说八道……

original: Ruby: That story is nothing but religious propaganda to prop up the noble houses.
translation: Ruby: 这种故事只不过是赞扬贵族的宣传手段。

original: ERIS: Regardless,[p/] the significance of this legend is in the Scaled Lord himself.
translation: ERIS: 无论如何，[p/]这个传说的意义在于鳞甲领主本身。

original: TYRION: Do you mean Rathallion?
translation: TYRION: 你是说拉萨利昂？

original: ERIS ILLMATER: Rathallion bestowed the power to become a mage on several individuals.
translation: ERIS ILLMATER: 拉萨利昂将魔力赋予几个人，让他们成为法师。

original: ERIS ILLMATER: And to this day,[p/] that power can only be passed down genetically.
translation: ERIS ILLMATER: 而到了现在，[p/]这种力量只能通过血缘传承。

original: ERIS ILLMATER: Can you think of an arcane spell that can produce something like that?
translation: ERIS ILLMATER: 你能想到哪种奥术魔法可以和他一样创造魔力吗？

original: TYRION CUTHBERT: No…[p/] I suppose not.
translation: TYRION CUTHBERT: 不……[p/]我不觉得。

original: ERIS ILLMATER: Rathallion must have had powers that weren’t bound by the rules of the Arcane Arts.
translation: ERIS ILLMATER: 拉萨利昂肯定有什么不受奥术魔法的法则限制的力量。

original: ERIS ILLMATER: In other words,[p/] he could create supernatural phenomena without following the rules of magic.
translation: ERIS ILLMATER: 换种说法就是，[p/]他能够在不遵循魔法规则的情况下，创造超自然现象。

original: RUBY TYMORA: Please,[p/] do you honestly expect us to believe a story like that?
translation: RUBY TYMORA: 拜托了，[p/]你真的觉得我们会相信这样的故事吗？

original: RUBY TYMORA: It’s completely unrealistic.
translation: RUBY TYMORA: 这完全不现实。

original: ERIS ILLMATER: …As unrealistic as a non-mage using supernatural powers?
translation: ERIS ILLMATER: ……就像一个非法师使用超自然力量一样不现实吗？

original: RUBY TYMORA: …
translation: RUBY TYMORA: ……

original: She has a point…
translation: 她其实说得有道理……

original: It’s a far-fetched theory…[p/] But it’s honestly the closest thing you have to a lead right now.
translation: 这个理论本身牵强……[p/]但老实说已经是你手里最接近线索的情报了。

original: Tyrion: What do you think about this, Eris?
translation: Tyrion: 厄莉斯，你对这个有什么想法吗？

original: Eris: You're already resorting to presenting me things?
translation: Eris: 你已经开始要对我展示东西了吗？

original: Eris: We've only just started.[p/] I really think you're overthinking things.
translation: Eris: 我们才刚开始呢，[p/]我觉得你想太复杂了。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Eris: Or do you simply want to see all the unique things that I have to say?
translation: Eris: 或者你只是想看我所有能说的独特内容？

original: Eris: I'm sorry to disappoint you.[p/] But I'm not some script for you to toy around with.
translation: Eris: 不好意思让你失望了，[p/]但我可不是什么你能玩弄的台本哦。

original: Eris: Feel free to try again later, though.
translation: Eris: 不过等会儿可以随你尝试啦。

original: ...You're not exactly sure what she's talking about.
translation: ……你真的不知道她在说什么。

original: Catherine: Ah…[p/] Of course, it would be [i]you[/i] lot making all of this noise.
translation: Catherine: 啊……[p/]当然，是<u>你</u>一直在制造噪音。

original: Suddenly,[p/] a woman who appears to be an instructor approaches you.
translation: 突然，[p/]一个看起来像是讲师的女人向你们走过来。

original: She looks upon each of you with an equal amount of disdain.
translation: 她对你们每个人都投以同样轻蔑的目光。

original: WALLACE: P-[p/][s/]P-[p/][s/]Professor Bellwether!
translation: WALLACE: 贝、[p/][s/]贝、[p/][s/]贝尔维瑟教授！

original: CATHERINE: That is [s/][i]Professor[/i][p/] Bellwether to you.
translation: CATHERINE: 你应该称呼我贝尔维瑟<u>教授</u>。

original: Celeste: But...[p/] Didn't he just call you-?
translation: Celeste: 但是……[p/]他刚才不就是这么叫你——？

original: CATHERINE: I knew letting you rabble into our walls would lead to nothing but trouble.
translation: CATHERINE: 我就知道你们这些贱民混进来只会制造麻烦。

original: CATHERINE: …You’ve even started associating with our malcontents.
translation: CATHERINE: ……你们甚至已经开始和我们这里的问题分子搭上线了。

original: WALLACE: …
translation: WALLACE: ……

original: RUBY: The headmaster gave us express permission to be here.
translation: RUBY: 是校长许可我们进入这里的。

original: RUBY: If you have an issue with that,[p/] take it up with him.
translation: RUBY: 如果你对此有意见，[p/]那得去和他说。

original: CATHERINE: Hmph…[p/] I’ll have you know that I was on my way to do just that.
translation: CATHERINE: 哼……[p/]你最好知道我正要这么做。

original: CATHERINE: …Wallace.
translation: CATHERINE: ……华莱士。

original: WALLACE: Y-[p/]y-[p/]y-[p/]y-[p/]yes?!
translation: WALLACE: 我、[p/]我、[p/]我、[p/]我、[p/]我在？！

original: CATHERINE: How am I supposed to understand you when you’re stuttering?!
translation: CATHERINE: 你这么结结巴巴的我怎么知道你在说什么？！

original: WALLACE: Yes,[p/][s/] Professor Bellwether!
translation: WALLACE: 是，[p/][s/]贝尔维瑟教授！

original: CATHERINE: Straighten out your uniform and fix that [i]awful[/i] hair.
translation: CATHERINE: 整理好你的制服和那头<u>乱糟糟</u>的头发。

original: CATHERINE: You look like a street urchin.
translation: CATHERINE: 看着跟个街头的流浪儿一样。

original: CATHERINE: …But I suppose it’s unreasonable to expect anything more.
translation: CATHERINE: ……但我想要求你更多也不现实。

original: WALLACE: …
translation: WALLACE: ……

original: CATHERINE: And as for you Er
translation: CATHERINE: 至于你，厄

original: CATHERINE: I’ll be on my way.
translation: CATHERINE: 我这就走了。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: CELESTE: …What a bitch.
translation: CELESTE: ……真是个泼妇。

original: WALLACE: C-[p/][s/]Celeste!
translation: WALLACE: 塞、[p/][s/]塞莱斯特！

original: CELESTE: Oh, come on![p/][s/] We were all thinking it!
translation: CELESTE: 哎呀，得了吧！[p/][s/]我们不都这么认为嘛！

original: ERIS: Anyways,[p/] with that out of the way,[p/] shall we begin?
translation: ERIS: 总之，[p/]碍事的人也走了，[p/]我们从哪里开始？

original: CELESTE: …
translation: CELESTE: ……

original: What…?[p/] Why do you keep detecting fear from Celeste?
translation: 怎么了……？[p/]你为什么一直从塞莱斯特身上探测到恐惧的情感？

original: ERIS: Wallace you’ve finished this week’s assignment, haven’t you?
translation: ERIS: 华莱士，你已经做完这周的作业了吧，对吗？

original: Eris: Would you mind helping Celeste with her research?
translation: Eris: 你介意帮一帮塞莱斯特做研究吗？

original: WALLACE: U-[p/][s/]Um…[p/] I don’t know…
translation: WALLACE: 呃、[p/][s/]嗯……[p/]我不知道……

original: CELESTE: Now that you mention it…[p/] I could really use some help finding a specific spell formula.
translation: CELESTE: 既然你都这么说了……[p/]我确实需要人帮忙找一个具体的魔法范式。

original: CELESTE: You know your way around here.[p/] Right, Wallace?
translation: CELESTE: 你对这里很熟悉吧。[p/]是不，华莱士？

original: WALLACE: U-[p/][s/]Um…[p/] O-[p/][s/]okay.
translation: WALLACE: 呃、[p/][s/]嗯……[p/]好、[p/][s/]好的。

original: RUBY: …
translation: RUBY: ……

original: TYRION: D-[p/][s/]Don’t worry, Ms. Tymora.
translation: TYRION: 别、[p/][s/]别担心，泰摩拉女士。

original: TYRION: I’ll be more careful from now on.
translation: TYRION: 我现在开始会更小心。

original: RUBY: …Please do.
translation: RUBY: ……拜托你一定要这么做。

original: RUBY: I still have some business to take care of here.[p/] So, I’ll leave you all to it.
translation: RUBY: 我在这里还有其他事情要处理。[p/]所以接下来都靠你们自己了。

original: You spend the next few hours searching through the library’s books with Eris.
translation: 接下来几个小时，你与厄莉斯一起在图书馆搜寻资料。

original: You hadn’t thought to look into the ancient dragons.[p/] And the library had books about them in abundance.
translation: 你之前没想过要调查那些古龙，[p/]刚好图书馆里有很多关于他们的书籍。

original: There was one problem though…
translation: 虽说还是有一个问题……

original: TYRION: There are a lot of myths and stories about the ancient dragons...
translation: TYRION: 这里有很多关于古龙的神话与故事……

original: TYRION: But it’s pretty difficult to tell fact from fiction with these accounts.
translation: TYRION: 但很难区分这里面的事实与虚构成分。

original: ERIS: It can’t be helped.[p/] The Church of Bahamut is the dominant religion of our kingdom.
translation: ERIS: 这也没办法。[p/]巴哈姆特教会是我们王国的国教。

original: Eris: We have the bones of dragons displayed in museums. But those bones are the only widely known evidence of the dragons' existence.
translation: Eris: 博物馆有展出一些龙骨，但那也是证明龙存在的唯一广为人知的证据。

original: TYRION: Except for Rathallion…[p/] possibly…
translation: TYRION: 除非说拉萨利昂……[p/]很有可能……

original: TYRION: I wonder if he’s still alive,[p/] like you said.
translation: TYRION: 我在想就像你所说的，[p/]他也许还活着。

original: ERIS: I wouldn’t be surprised.
translation: ERIS: 那我也不会奇怪。

original: Eris: Despite everything,[p/] our kingdom’s constitution still includes him in our government.
translation: Eris: 抛开别的不谈，[p/]我国宪法依然把他纳入了政府之中。

original: TYRION: Wait…[p/] Really?
translation: TYRION: 等一等……[p/]真的吗？

original: ERIS: As the savior of our kingdom,[p/] he and his kin were given an honorary position on our political hierarchy.
translation: ERIS: 作为王国的救世主，[p/]他和自己的血亲在政界有个荣誉职位。

original: ERIS: The ancient dragons' authority technically rivals that of King Olivier.
translation: ERIS: 古龙的威权能匹敌奥利维尔王。

original: TYRION: Wow…[p/] I had no idea.
translation: TYRION: 哇……[p/]我根本不知道。

original: TYRION: How have I never heard of this before?
translation: TYRION: 怎么我之前都没听说过？

original: ERIS: To be honest,[p/] that law is just a way to revere him and appease the church.
translation: ERIS: 老实讲，[p/]这条法律只是为了讨好教会，显示对他的尊敬罢了。

original: Well,[p/] Rathallion couldn’t [i]possibly[/i] be any worse than the nobility.
translation: 总之，[p/]拉萨利昂也<u>没可能</u>比贵族们更坏了。

original: TYRION: [s/]A-[p/]Ah!
translation: TYRION: [s/]啊、[p/]哎呀！

original: You’re so stuck in your own thoughts that you accidentally bump into a bookshelf.
translation: 你沉浸在自己的思绪里，突然与一个书架撞了个正着。

original: The shelf begins to tip over and you’re able to catch it before it fully falls over.
translation: 书架开始翻倒，还好你能在它完全倒下前扶住它。

original: …But not before several books fall out from their shelves.
translation: ……但还是有好几本书从书架上掉了下来。

original: They hit the ground with a cacophony of thuds.[p/] Some students glance in your direction.
translation: 它们砰一声摔在地上。[p/]一些学生向你这边瞥了一眼。

original: Catherine: Be quiet!
translation: Catherine: 安静！

original: TYRION: S-[p/][s/]Sorry!
translation: TYRION: 对、[p/][s/]对不起！

original: Catherine: BE QUIET!
translation: Catherine: <size=1.5em>安静！</size>

original: Eris begins giggling.[p/] She seems amused by what’s happening.
translation: 厄莉斯咯咯笑了起来，[p/]似乎觉得这一出很滑稽。

original: CELESTE: Hey,[p/] are you okay?
translation: CELESTE: 嘿，[p/]你还好吗？

original: Celeste: I heard a loud-
translation: Celeste: 我听到好大一声——

original: Celeste: …Whoa.
translation: Celeste: ……哇。

original: Celeste stares at the pile of fallen books.
translation: 塞莱斯特盯着掉下来的书籍。

original: CELESTE: Pfft…[p/] What did you do?
translation: CELESTE: 噗……[p/]你干什么了？

original: TYRION: F-[p/][s/]Forget that...[p/] Just help me clean this up.
translation: TYRION: 忘、[p/][s/]忘了吧……[p/]帮我把这里整理好就行。

original: ERIS: Ah…[p/] There’s no need for that.
translation: ERIS: 啊……[p/]没有这个必要。

original: ERIS: Construct.[p/][s/] I require assistance!
translation: ERIS: 构造体。[p/][s/]我请求帮助！

original: Arcane: ACKNOWLEDGED!
translation: Arcane: <size=1.5em>遵命！</size>

original: CELESTE: Agh![p/][s/] W-[p/][s/]What-?!
translation: CELESTE: 哎呀！[p/][s/]那、[p/][s/]那是——？！

original: Upon Eris's command, [p/] one of the nearby suits of armor suddenly springs to life and begins walking towards you.
translation: 厄莉斯一声令下后，[p/]旁边的一套盔甲突然活了过来，向你走过来。

original: The voice coming out of it [i]sounds[/i] human…[p/] but it lacks emotion.
translation: 它的声音<u>听起来</u>像人……[p/]但是缺乏感情。

original: Why does it sound familiar…?
translation: 怎么听起来这么熟悉……？

original: TYRION: ...Wait,[p/] did [i]you[/i] do that, Eris?
translation: TYRION: ……等等，[p/]厄莉斯，是<u>你</u>控制的？

original: ERIS: Yes.[p/] This is an Arcane Construct.
translation: ERIS: 是啊。[p/]这是个奥术构造体。

original: ERIS: It's a suit of armor that's animated using artificery.
translation: ERIS: 它实际上是由奥术能源驱动的一套盔甲。

original: ERIS: They’re designed to carry out various tasks for the students.
translation: ERIS: 它们被设计为可以替学生执行多种任务。

original: CELESTE: Really?[p/] I didn’t know anything like that existed.
translation: CELESTE: 真的？[p/]我还不知道有这样的东西存在。

original: ERIS: They’re still experimental.[p/] So,[p/] they aren’t available to the public yet.
translation: ERIS: 它们还在试验阶段。[p/]因此，[p/]还不能提供公众使用。

original: ERIS: With that being said…[p/][s/] Construct.[p/] Please place these books back where they belong.
translation: ERIS: 话虽如此……[p/][s/]构造体。[p/]请把这些书归还原位。

original: Arcane: ACKNOWLEDGED.
translation: Arcane: <size=1.5em>遵命。</size>

original: On Eris’s command,[p/] the Construct begins quickly picking up the books.
translation: 按照厄莉斯的指令，[p/]构造体开始快速捡起地上的书。

original: It moves with inhuman efficiency.
translation: 它的动作效率远超人类水平。

original: After only a few seconds,[p/] all of the books are back on their shelves.
translation: 仅仅几秒钟，[p/]所有的书籍都放回书架上了。

original: CELESTE: Wow![p/] So, they do whatever you tell them to do?
translation: CELESTE: 哇哦！[p/]所以你让它干什么它就干什么？

original: Eris: Well, there [i]are[/i] some limits to-
translation: Eris: 这个，其实<u>有</u>一些限制——

original: CELESTE: Construct![p/][s/] Tell me that I’m the fairest maiden you’ve ever seen!
translation: CELESTE: 构造体！[p/][s/]对我说，我是你见过最漂亮的少女！

original: Arcane: COMMAND REJECTED.
translation: Arcane: <size=1.5em>拒绝执行。</size>

original: CELESTE: Aw…[p/] What?
translation: CELESTE: 喔……[p/]什么呀？

original: TYRION: I guess they’re not allowed to lie.
translation: TYRION: 我猜它们不被允许撒谎。

original: You feel a sharp pain in your side as Celeste quickly jabs you.
translation: 塞莱斯特迅速戳了你一下，你感觉一阵剧痛。

original: ERIS: The construct’s “voice” is just a series of pre-recorded messages.
translation: ERIS: 奥术构造体的“声音”只是一系列提前录制好的片段。

original: ERIS: I’m not sure if you noticed,[p/] but it uses the voice of Professor Bellwether.
translation: ERIS: 不知道你有没有注意到，[p/]它用的是贝尔维瑟教授的声音。

original: ERIS: Unfortunately,[p/] you can’t make them say anything other than what’s recorded.
translation: ERIS: 不过遗憾的是，[p/]它们只能说那些提前录制好的语句。

original: ERIS: Only the headmaster can change those settings.
translation: ERIS: 只有校长能更改这些设定。

original: TYRION: Artificery that can record audio…
translation: TYRION: 可以录制声音的奥术产品吗……

original: TYRION: I’ve never seen anything like it.
translation: TYRION: 我还没见过这样的东西。

original: Celeste: But you just said that they're experimental, right?
translation: Celeste: 但你刚刚说它们还在试验阶段是吗？

original: Celeste: Maybe if I keep asking it,[p/] it'll just give up and do it.
translation: Celeste: 如果我一直这么问它，[p/]它可能就会照做了。

original: Eris: I would advise against that.
translation: Eris: 我不建议这么做哦。

original: Eris: Even if the commands are rejected,[p/] they're still stored in the Construct's command logs.
translation: Eris: 即使指令被拒绝执行，[p/]还是会储存在构造体的命令日志里。

original: ERIS: Anyways,[p/] we should probably get back to work.
translation: ERIS: 总之，[p/]我们应该继续回去研究了。

original: CELESTE: Fine…
translation: CELESTE: 好吧……

original: You read more about the ancient dragons.
translation: 你阅读了更多关于古龙的资料。

original: But most of the stories read more like fables than actual historical accounts.
translation: 但大多数故事读起来更像寓言，而非真实的历史记载。

original: Tyrion: Hm...[p/] I don't feel like I'm making any progress...
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……[p/]我感觉没什么进展啊……

original: Suddenly,[p/] you hear a thunderous low-pitched sound blare across the room.
translation: 突然，[p/]你听到房间里传来一阵雷鸣般的低沉声音。

original: It sounds like a high-pitched horn...[p/] But with its volume turned up to unnatural levels.
translation: 听起来像是一种高音号角……[p/]但音量调高到不自然的水平。

original: TYRION: W-[p/][s/]What…?
translation: TYRION: 发、[p/][s/]发生什么事……？

original: TYRION: Celeste,[p/][s/] do you hear that?!
translation: TYRION: 塞莱斯特，[p/][s/]你听到了吗？

original: CELESTE: Ugh…[p/][s/] How can I not?!
translation: CELESTE: 呃……[p/][s/]我怎么可能听不到？

original: CELESTE: What is that?!
translation: CELESTE: 那是什么？！

original: TYRION: You didn’t touch anything you weren’t supposed to, right…?
translation: TYRION: 你没碰到什么不该碰的东西，对吧……？

original: CELESTE: What?![p/][s/] Of course not!
translation: CELESTE: 什么啊？！[p/][s/]当然没有啊！

original: Celeste: It finally stopped...
translation: Celeste: 终于停下来了……

original: WALLACE: E-[p/]Eris…[p/][s/] Wasn’t that the lockdown system?!
translation: WALLACE: 厄、[p/]厄莉斯……[p/][s/]那不是封锁系统吗？！

original: ERIS: Yes.[p/] I believe so.
translation: ERIS: 对。[p/]我也这么认为。

original: TYRION: “Lockdown system”?
translation: TYRION: “封锁系统”？

original: ERIS: The academy is outfitted with a large artificery system.
translation: ERIS: 学院配置了一套大型奥术系统。

original: ERIS: In a state of emergency,[p/] it will erect magical barriers throughout the building.
translation: ERIS: 出现紧急情况时，[p/]它会在整栋大楼里展开魔法屏障。

original: CELESTE: “State of emergency”?
translation: CELESTE: “紧急情况”？

original: CELESTE: Should…[p/] we be worried?
translation: CELESTE: 我们……[p/]应该担心吗？

original: ERIS: Don’t worry.[p/] The lockdown is designed to keep everyone safe.
translation: ERIS: 别紧张。[p/]封锁是为了保障大家的安全。

original: ERIS: We’re safe as long as the barriers are up.
translation: ERIS: 只要屏障还在我们就是安全的。

original: But…[p/] Ms. Tymora.[p/][s/] She said she was going to do something on campus!
translation: 但是……[p/]还有泰摩拉女士。[p/][s/]她说过她在校园里还有其他事情要做！

original: Theodore: I-[p/][s/]I’m terribly sorry!
translation: Theodore: 我、[p/][s/]我很抱歉！

original: You suddenly hear a disembodied voice echo through the library.
translation: 你突然听到一阵声音在图书馆内回响，但看不到说话的人。

original: It sounds like it’s being projected magically.
translation: 听起来像是魔法投射出来的。

original: WALLACE: I-[p/]It’s the headmaster![p/][s/] He’s using the intercom system!
translation: WALLACE: 是、[p/]是校长！[p/][s/]他在用内部通讯系统讲话！

original: Theodore: Students and faculty![p/][s/] Please remain calm!
translation: Theodore: 全体师生！[p/][s/]请保持冷静！

original: Theodore: T-[p/]There’s…[p/][s/] There’s been a murder on the academy grounds!
translation: Theodore: 现、[p/]现在……[p/][s/]现在学院里发生了一起凶杀案！

original: TYRION: What?!
translation: TYRION: 什么？！

original: Theodore: Please stay where you are and wait for law enforcement to arrive!
translation: Theodore: 在执法部门到来之前，请各位在原地等候！

original: CELESTE: …
translation: CELESTE: ……

original: TYRION: Damn it![p/][s/] We have to get out of here!
translation: TYRION: 该死！[p/][s/]我们得想办法出去！

original: ERIS: I’m afraid that’s not possible…
translation: ERIS: 我想那是不可能的……

original: ERIS: The lockdown system protects and locks each room.
translation: ERIS: 封锁系统在保护的同时锁闭了每个房间。

original: ERIS: We can’t leave this room until it’s deactivated.
translation: ERIS: 直到它解除，我们都没法离开这间屋子。

original: TYRION: W-[p/][s/]Well...[p/][s/] We won’t know until we try!
translation: TYRION: 但、[p/][s/]但是……[p/][s/]我们不试试怎么知道呢！

original: You run to the entrance and begin frantically pulling on the door’s handle.
translation: 你跑向入口，疯狂地拽门把手。

original: You try to put all your strength into prying it open,[p/] but it doesn’t even budge.
translation: 你竭尽全力想撬开它，[p/]但门纹丝不动。

original: CELESTE: Tyrion, stop!
translation: CELESTE: 提利昂，停下来！

original: TYRION: B-[p/]But…[p/][s/] Ms. Tymora!
translation: TYRION: 但、[p/]但是……[p/][s/]泰摩拉女士！

original: CELESTE: I know that you’re worried about her.[p/] But there's already been a murder.
translation: CELESTE: 我知道你很担心她。[p/]但这里已经发生了一起凶杀案。

original: Celeste: We don’t know [i]where[/i] the attacker is,[p/] [i]or[/i] if they're still armed.
translation: Celeste: 我们不知道凶手<u>在哪里</u>，[p/]<u>也</u>不知道他们是否还持有武器。

original: CELESTE: The best thing we can do right now is stay here and wait.
translation: CELESTE: 我们现在最好的选择就是原地等待。

original: …She’s right.
translation: ……她是对的。

original: TYRION: …
translation: TYRION: ……

original: TYRION: Damn it!
translation: TYRION: 该死的！

original: CELESTE: …
translation: CELESTE: ……

original: Celeste’s hand rests on her sword.[p/] Her eyes are carefully watching the entrance.
translation: 塞莱斯特把手按在剑柄上。[p/]她小心地监视着入口。

original: WALLACE: W-[p/]Wow…[p/] We’ve been here for hours. and she still hasn’t stopped watching the door.
translation: WALLACE: 哇、[p/]哇哦……[p/]我们已经困在这里快一小时了，她都没把目光从门上移开。

original: …She was also able to calm you down earlier.
translation: ……她也能让你尽早冷静下来。

original: It's easy to forget sometimes...[p/] But she’s always reliable when it really counts.
translation: 有时候真的很容易忘记……[p/]但关键的时候她总是很可靠。

original: CELESTE: …What?
translation: CELESTE: ……怎么了？

original: Theodore: Students and faculty.[p/] Thank you for your patience.
translation: Theodore: 各位师生。[p/]感谢你们的耐心。

original: Theodore: Law enforcement has secured the building.
translation: Theodore: 执法部门已确保大楼安全。

original: Theodore: The lockdown has been lifted.[p/] However,[p/] please remain in the building until-
translation: Theodore: 封锁已经解除。[p/]但是，[p/]请各位继续待在大楼里，直到——

original: The headmaster is barely finished with his message before you’re out the door.
translation: 校长还没说完你就已经飞奔出去。

original: CELESTE: Tyrion?!
translation: CELESTE: 提利昂？！

original: Celeste: Hey![p/][s/] Don’t go off on your own!
translation: Celeste: 嘿！[p/][s/]别自己一个人行动！

original: You desperately run through the academy hallways.
translation: 你拼命地穿过学院走廊。

original: Tyrion: No…[p/] No…
translation: Tyrion: 不……[p/]不……

original: Tyrion: Ms. Tymora?!
translation: Tyrion: 泰摩拉女士？！

original: Tyrion: Ms. Tymora![p/][s/] Where are you?!
translation: Tyrion: 泰摩拉女士！[p/][s/]你在哪里？！

original: You have no idea where you’re even going anymore.
translation: 你根本不知道你在往哪里跑。

original: You can feel your fear and anxiety rise with every passing moment.
translation: 随着时间流逝，你感到恐惧与焦虑不断增长。

original: Where is she?!
translation: 她在哪儿？！

original: RUBY: …Cuthbert?
translation: RUBY: ……卡斯伯特？

original: RUBY: What’s wrong?[p/] Why are you shouting?
translation: RUBY: 发生什么了？[p/]你为什么大喊大叫的？

original: TYRION: M-[p/][s/]Ms. Tymora!
translation: TYRION: 泰、[p/][s/]泰摩拉女士！

original: RUBY: Calm down…[p/] You’re hyperventilating.
translation: RUBY: 冷静一点……[p/]你都喘不过气了。

original: TYRION: I-[p/][s/]I heard there was a murder and-
translation: TYRION: 我、[p/][s/]我听说发生了一起凶杀案然后——

original: TYRION: I-[p/][s/]I’ve been looking all over for you!
translation: TYRION: 我、[p/][s/]我在到处找你！

original: RUBY: ...And you were worried about me?
translation: RUBY: ……你很担心我吗？

original: TYRION: I-[p/][s/]I j-[p/][s/]just-
translation: TYRION: 我、[p/][s/]我就、[p/][s/]就是——

original: You hug Ms. Tymora tightly as you’re overcome with emotion.
translation: 你情绪激动，紧紧地抱住泰摩拉女士。

original: She’s usually not receptive to affection,[p/] but you don’t care.
translation: 她通常不怎么接受这种感情，[p/]但你也不在乎了。

original: You’re just relieved that she’s safe.
translation: 你只是因她安全感到宽慰。

original: CELESTE: Tyrion![p/][s/] There you are!
translation: CELESTE: 提利昂！[p/][s/]你在这儿呢！

original: CELESTE: And…[p/] you're crying.
translation: CELESTE: 呃……[p/]你都哭了。

original: RUBY: S-[p/][s/]Sorry…[p/] I didn’t mean to worry you so much...
translation: RUBY: 抱、[p/][s/]抱歉……[p/]我没想让你这么担心来着……

original: CELESTE: We heard the announcement.
translation: CELESTE: 我们听到了公告。

original: CELESTE: Do you know what happened, Ruby?
translation: CELESTE: 鲁比，你知道发生了什么吗？

original: RUBY: I do.[p/] But...
translation: RUBY: 知道。[p/]不过……

original: You see Ms. Tymora glance at Wallace for a brief moment.
translation: 你看到泰摩拉女士快速地瞥了一眼华莱士。

original: RUBY: For now…[p/] I think we should head to the foyer.
translation: RUBY: 现在……[p/]我们该去前厅了。

original: You arrive at the foyer and see the room swarmed with a legion of familiar knights.
translation: 你到达前厅，发现房间里挤满了那群熟悉的骑士。

original: TYRION: Is that the Inquisition?
translation: TYRION: 那是裁判所的人？

original: TYRION: Don’t tell me…
translation: TYRION: 别告诉我……

original: CELESTE: The headmaster mentioned that there was a murder on campus…
translation: CELESTE: 校长说了学院里发生了一起凶杀案……

original: CELESTE: Someone used magic.
translation: CELESTE: 有人使用了魔法。

original: ORYM: Hey![p/][s/] You, there!
translation: ORYM: 喂！[p/][s/]那边，就是你！

original: As you enter the foyer,[p/] Commander White notices you and begins marching in your direction.
translation: 你一走进前厅，[p/]怀特指挥官就注意到了，他向你这边走过来。

original: …But his attention isn’t focused on you.
translation: ……但他注意力不在你身上。

original: WALLACE: H-[p/][s/]Huh?!
translation: WALLACE: 哈、[p/][s/]哈啊？！

original: ORYM: Are you Wallace Nightgrave?!
translation: ORYM: 你就是华莱士·奈特格雷夫吗？！

original: WALLACE: U-[p/][s/]Um…[p/] yes?[p/] B-[p/]But-
translation: WALLACE: 呃、[p/][s/]嗯……[p/]是啊？[p/]但、[p/]但是——

original: ORYM: By the authority of the Wyverngarde Crown,[p/][s/] I’m placing you under arrest!
translation: ORYM: 以维文加德皇室的名义，[p/][s/]我在此将你逮捕！

original: CELESTE: Hey,[p/][s/] what are you doing?!
translation: CELESTE: 嘿，[p/][s/]你干嘛呀？！

original: ORYM: You three…?
translation: ORYM: 是你们三个……？

original: ORYM: The hell are [i]you[/i] doing here?
translation: ORYM: <u>你们</u>到底又在这里搞什么鬼？

original: Tyrion: You said he was under arrest?
translation: Tyrion: 你说他被逮捕了？

original: Tyrion: On what charges?
translation: Tyrion: 因为什么罪名？

original: ORYM: This kid is charged with the murder of Catherine Bellwether.
translation: ORYM: 这小子被指控杀死了凯瑟琳·贝尔维瑟。

original: TYRION: What?!
translation: TYRION: 什么？！

original: Wasn’t that the professor you met in the library earlier?
translation: 那不就是你之前在图书馆遇到的那个教授吗？

original: CELESTE: Like hell you’re arresting him!
translation: CELESTE: 你别想逮捕他！

original: CELESTE: He was with us in the library for the entire morning!
translation: CELESTE: 整个上午他都在图书馆里，和我们一起！

original: CELESTE: There’s no way he could have murdered her!
translation: CELESTE: 他才没可能杀了她！

original: RUBY: …
translation: RUBY: ……

original: RUBY: Move aside, Celeste.
translation: RUBY: 让开吧，塞莱斯特。

original: CELESTE: B-[p/]but-!
translation: CELESTE: 但、[p/]但是——！

original: TYRION: Ms. Tymora is right.
translation: TYRION: 泰摩拉女士是对的。

original: TYRION: If Wallace is a suspect,[p/] we can’t stop the Inquisition from arresting him.
translation: TYRION: 如果华莱士被列为嫌疑人，[p/]我们也不能阻止裁判所逮捕他。

original: WALLACE: No…
translation: WALLACE: 不要……

original: TYRION: Don’t worry, Wallace.
translation: TYRION: 别担心，华莱士。

original: TYRION: We’ll get to the bottom of what happened.
translation: TYRION: 我们会查清事情的真相。

original: WALLACE: …
translation: WALLACE: ……

original: Without a word,[p/] Wallace allows the Inquisition to drag him away.
translation: 华莱士一言不发，[p/]就这么让裁判所的人拖走了。

original: ERIS: My apologies.
translation: ERIS: 真对不起。

original: ERIS: I’m going to go and check on him.
translation: ERIS: 我要去看看他。

original: Celeste: This is terrible...
translation: Celeste: 这太糟糕了……

original: TYRION: I still don't understand.
translation: TYRION: 我还是不明白……

original: TYRION: Why would they suspect Wallace of all people?
translation: TYRION: 这里这么多人，他们为什么偏偏怀疑华莱士？

original: Ruby: I’m not sure myself.
translation: Ruby: 我自己也不确定。

original: Ruby: Unlike most magical homicides,[p/] this school is filled with plenty of mages.
translation: Ruby: 不像大多数的魔法杀人案，[p/]这所学院到处都是法师。

original: Ruby: There [i]has[/i] to be a long list of suspects.
translation: Ruby: <u>应该</u>有个很长的嫌疑人名单才对。

original: CELESTE: Isn’t there anything we can do?
translation: CELESTE: 我们现在没有其他能做的了吗？

original: TYRION: …
translation: TYRION: ……

original: TYRION: I’m going to go investigate what happened.
translation: TYRION: 我要去调查详情。

original: RUBY: Cuthbert.
translation: RUBY: 卡斯伯特。

original: TYRION: Y-[p/][s/]yes?
translation: TYRION: 怎、[p/][s/]怎么啦？

original: RUBY: He hasn’t accepted you as his attorney yet.
translation: RUBY: 他还没确定委托你辩护呢。

original: RUBY: You don’t even know if you’ll be working this case.
translation: RUBY: 你都不知道自己会不会接手这个案子。

original: Tyrion: But…[p/] I [i]know[/i] that he’s innocent.
translation: Tyrion: 但是……[p/]我<u>知道</u>他是无罪的。

original: Tyrion: I just can’t sit here and do nothing!
translation: Tyrion: 我不能待在这里什么也不做！

original: RUBY: …
translation: RUBY: ……

original: RUBY: *sigh*[p/] Well,[p/] I clearly can’t stop you.
translation: RUBY: *叹气* [p/]好吧，[p/]显然我也拦不住你。

original: RUBY: But [i]please[/i] remember that being an attorney is your [i]job[/i].[p/] It’s not charity work.
translation: RUBY: 但<u>拜托</u>要记得辩护是你的<u>工作</u>，[p/]而不是慈善行为。

original: Ruby: Don't come crying to me if you run out of gold.
translation: Ruby: 到时候没钱了别哭着来找我。

original: Tyrion: R-[p/][s/]Right...
translation: Tyrion: 嗯、[p/][s/]好……

original: RUBY: Anyways,[p/] I still have some business to take care of in the city.
translation: RUBY: 总而言之，[p/]我还要回城里处理些事情。

original: RUBY: Will you two be okay handling this?
translation: RUBY: 就你们两个没问题吧？

original: TYRION: Y-[p/]Yes.[p/][s/] We'll take care of this!
translation: TYRION: 没、[p/]没问题。[p/][s/]我们对付得了！

original: RUBY: Good.
translation: RUBY: 很好。

original: Ruby: I'll leave everything to you then.
translation: Ruby: 那都交给你们了。

original: TYRION: Alright.[p/] Let’s go, Celeste.
translation: TYRION: 好了。[p/]我们走吧，塞莱斯特。

original: CELESTE: Right!
translation: CELESTE: 好！

original: TYRION: Celeste,[p/] this room was close to the crime scene.
translation: TYRION: 塞莱斯特，[p/]厨房离犯罪现场很近。

original: TYRION: Could you cast [b]Detect Magic[/b] and scan for magical traces?
translation: TYRION: 你能施放[b]法术探测[/b]扫描一下魔法痕迹吗？

original: CELESTE: Sure.
translation: CELESTE: 没问题。

original: VALENTINA: …! [mind="Did he just say, [q]scan for magical traces[q]?!" /]
translation: VALENTINA: ……！[mind="他说要“扫描一下魔法痕迹”？！" /]

original: VALENTINA: O-[p/]Oh![p/][s/] I-[p/][s/]I’ll just get out of your way, then!
translation: VALENTINA: 这、[p/]这样啊！[p/][s/]那、[p/][s/]那我先走了，免得碍你们的事！

original: Celeste: Wow...[p/] She just bolted out of the room.
translation: Celeste: 哇噻……[p/]她一溜烟似的跑走了耶。

original: What was [i]that[/i] about?
translation: 她这是<u>怎么个情况</u>？

original: Tyrion: There's a rack of cooking implements hanging from the wall.
translation: Tyrion: 墙上挂着各类厨具。

original: Celeste: Valentina must use these to cook for the students.
translation: Celeste: 瓦伦蒂娜给学生做饭，用的就是这些吧。

original: Tyrion: Several commonly used ingredients are close to the cooking area.
translation: Tyrion: 作业区边上放着常用食材。

original: Tyrion: It's a barrel full of some sort of drink.
translation: Tyrion: 桶子里装满了某种饮料。

original: Celeste: I wonder...
translation: Celeste: 我在想……

original: Tyrion: It's probably not Lotus Juice, Celeste...
translation: Tyrion: 那大概不是莲之水哦，塞莱斯特……

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: Oh,[p/] it's a plate of bread.
translation: Tyrion: 噢，[p/]有一盘面包。

original: Tyrion: They probably serve these as sides to the entrees.
translation: Tyrion: 大概是作为主菜的配菜供应的。

original: Celeste: ...Don't get any ideas, Tyrion.
translation: Celeste: ……别抱坏心思，提利昂。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……怎么了？

original: Celeste: Remember when we went to that fancy restaurant?
translation: Celeste: 还记得我们去那个高档餐厅的时候吗？

original: Celeste: You just [i]kept[/i] ordering breadsticks and butter.
translation: Celeste: 你当时<u>一直</u>只点面包条和黄油。

original: Tyrion: The bread is [i]free[/i]![p/][s/] I might as well take advantage of it!
translation: Tyrion: 那些面包都是<u>免费</u>的啊！[p/][s/]那我为什么不好好利用一下！

original: Celeste: You know eating that many carbs isn't good for you.
translation: Celeste: 你应该知道吃太多碳水食品对身体也不好啊。

original: Tyrion: Yeah, yeah...
translation: Tyrion: 好、好……
